ygData.subject: Re: Suggested monk improvements
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, no. Being a 47th lvl monk that routinely groups with a 50th lvl wizard that is very fond of Ice Comet, I can say with experience I couldn t steal a
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, no. Being a 47th lvl monk that routinely groups with a 50th
lvl wizard that is very fond of Ice Comet, I can say with experience I
couldn't steal a kill from him. No way you can do 500-700 hps of damage
in 10 secs on mobs that are of respectable level (ie blue), and even
then, most mobs have alot more than 1000hps.

Trinak
Veeshan

> From: "Mike Lehr" <mike@...>
>
>

> Daylight Time,

> monk friend who can

> Take that you damn kill
> > stealing wizards!!
> > >>
> >
> > ummmn... No...
>
>
> Actually yes, that is quite possible... since the
> fact that ice comet takes
> so long to cast, monks have plenty of time to pummel
> in a good 500-700 dmg,
> which very easily could be more then half of the
> MoBs HP therefore giving
> him the kill instead of the wizzie woh just just
> wasted a 900 mana spell...
